price: (Nkͻmhyεni), ka kyerε wͻn a wͻagye adie no sε: “Wͻnfa wͻn a wͻn ani nna Nyankopͻn Nna no soͻ no bͻne nkyε wͻn, sεdeε Ɔbɛtua amanfoͻ bi dwuma a wͻdiiε no so ka.
arabic: قُل لِّلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ يَغۡفِرُواْ لِلَّذِينَ لَا يَرۡجُونَ أَيَّامَ ٱللَّهِ لِيَجۡزِيَ قَوۡمَۢا بِمَا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qul lilladhīna āmanū yaghfirū lilladhīna lā yarjūna ayyāma al-lahi liyajziya qawman bimā kānū yaksibūna
